channel.title: Help with Hands
channel.description:
Hello I have a problem in my server with my hands timers not working for pking so I need help making it so when you attack with your hands it hits nothing every time. I'm also open to any other solution to my problem to.
Ps. Ive tried everything to make the timer work so please don't suggest fixing the timer.

item.title: Help with Hands
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

Only worked on npc’s :S

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Hands
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Add

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) { hitDiff = 0; }
Makes them hit 0 everytime.

Read full topic
